subject: Help with JUnit install on Fedora Core
msgSnippet: I m a beginner trying to install Globus Toolkit 3.2, and i m having trouble loading JUnit.  I m using Red Hat Fedora Core. After I download the zip file, what
messageBody:
I'm a beginner trying to install Globus Toolkit 3.2, and i'm having
trouble loading JUnit. I'm using Red Hat Fedora Core. After I
download the zip file, what do I do next? Please help.
